sentence.Network_en: Chosen by Shalassa among Acolytes, the Priestesses are rulers of the theocratic and matriarchic Sea - Elven society.
sentence.Network_cn: 被沙拉萨从助祭中选中的女祭司们是神权和母系的海精灵社会的统治者.
